Class: DecksEvent

DecksEvent

new DecksEvent(type, sender, data)

A custom event class for use within decks.js
Parameters:
Name Type Argument Default Description
type String The type of event (e.g. "item:changed")
sender * The sender of the event (e.g. the object which is emitting the event)
data * <optional>
 {} Custom data to include with the event (any type, Object, array, primitive, etc.)
